Value: PartialCoherence computes the partial coherence in a list of signals, 3 signals at a time.

Param_0: sampling frequency of the input DataFrame in Hz.
Param_2: specifies which kind of detrending should be computed on data. Ranges in [0;1]: 0 stands for constant detrending; 1 stands for linear detrending.
Param_3: number of points to overlap between epochs.
